overview: Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios. "Big John" — For a dozen years, John Holmes has been the standard by which other studs are measured. His two solo performances demonstrate exactly why!  "Black Velvet" — Bill Harrison, whose super endowment rivals even John Holmes, teams up with John Trayner, a hung, superbly muscled stud, in frame after frame of the hottest action ever!  "Doug" — A tribute to youth, beauty and a jockstrap! A three-handed solo! A classic performance.
title: Black Velvet
